title: FindFlora
description: A Java-based recommendation engine that employs machine learning techniques and spatial data structures to offer personalized flower recommendations.

title: Task2Calendar
description: A light-weighted Chrome Extension that clips tasks from web pages directly to your calendar.

title: TimeToGoal
description: An iOS app that combines short-term task planning and long-term goal tracking to help users stay focused.

title: Ufogram
description: A full-stack clone of Instagram, featuring user registration, profile customization, dynamic content feeds, and multimedia uploading.

title: IMDB Full-Stack Clone
description: A full-stack clone of IMDB for movie database management, featuring advanced search functionalities and optimized back-end queries.
